IX.iii.1.E.5.
b
.
Types of Income
The following four income classifications are defined in this topic:
nonrecurring
recurring
short-term recurring, and
irregular.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E - Pension - Basic Rate Determinations
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E
